In addition, Qt provides a number of ready-made standard dialogs that can be used for standard tasks like file or font selection.

In addition, Qt provides a number of ready-made standard dialogs that can be used for standard tasks like file or font selection.

trans-unit.source: QGraphicsLayout is an abstract class that defines a virtual API for arranging QGraphicsWidget children and other QGraphicsLayoutItem objects for a QGraphicsWidget. QGraphicsWidget assigns responsibility to a QGraphicsLayout through QGraphicsWidget::setLayout(). As the widget is resized, the layout will automatically arrange the widget's children. QGraphicsLayout inherits QGraphicsLayoutItem, so, it can be managed by any layout, including its own subclasses.
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsLayout是一个抽象类定义了虚拟API用于布置QGraphicsWidget儿童和其他QGraphicsLayoutItem对象要QGraphicsWidget。QGraphicsWidget通过QGraphicsWidget :: setLayout（）将责任分配给QGraphicsLayout。调整窗口小部件的大小时，布局将自动排列窗口小部件的子级。QGraphicsLayout继承了QGraphicsLayoutItem，因此，它可以由任何布局（包括其自己的子类）进行管理。

trans-unit.source: QGraphicsLayout is part of a second-generation layout framework designed specifically for QGraphicsWidget. Its API is very similar to that of QLayout. You can manage widgets and sublayouts inside either QGraphicsLinearLayout and QGraphicsGridLayout. You can also easily write your own layout by subclassing QGraphicsLayout yourself, or add your own QGraphicsItem items to the layout by writing an adaptor subclass of QGraphicsLayoutItem.

QGraphicsLayout listens to events for the widget it manages through the virtual widgetEvent() event handler. When the layout is assigned to a widget, all events delivered to the widget are first processed by widgetEvent(). This allows the layout to be aware of any relevant state changes on the widget such as visibility changes or layout direction changes.
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsLayout侦听通过虚拟widgetEvent（）事件处理程序管理的窗口小部件的事件。将布局分配给窗口小部件时，首先由widgetEvent（）处理交付给窗口小部件的所有事件。这使布局可以知道小部件上的任何相关状态更改，例如可见性更改或布局方向更改。

trans-unit.source: QGraphicsLayout provides the addChildLayoutItem() convenience function to add layout items to a custom layout. The function will automatically reparent graphics items, if required.
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsLayout提供了addChildLayoutItem（）便捷功能，可将布局项目添加到自定义布局。如果需要，该功能将自动重新设置图形项。

trans-unit.source: QGraphicsLayout updates its own geometry to match the contentsRect() of the QGraphicsLayoutItem it is managing. Thus, it will automatically rearrange all its items when the widget is resized. QGraphicsLayout caches the sizes of all its managed items to avoid calling setGeometry() too often.
trans-unit.target: QGraphicsLayout更新自身的几何形状相匹配的contentsRect中的（）QGraphicsLayoutItem它是管理。因此，当调整窗口小部件的大小时，它将自动重新排列其所有项目。QGraphicsLayout缓存其所有托管项目的大小，以避免过多地调用setGeometry（）。

trans-unit.source: QGraphicsWidget can be used as a base item for your own custom item if you require advanced input focus handling, e.g., tab focus and activation, or layouts.

GammaRay is a useful utility that provides diagnostic information about your application. It is similar to the QML Profiler described in the earlier section, but offers a lot more. For example, the number of items or QObjects created, function calls made, time taken by each function call, property value introspection at runtime, and so on. Such information is very handy, especially while debugging QML applications.
trans-unit.target: GammaRay是有用的实用程序，可提供有关您的应用程序的诊断信息。它与前面部分中描述的QML Profiler相似，但功能更多。例如，创建的项目或QObject的数量，进行的函数调用，每个函数调用花费的时间，运行时属性值的自省等等。这样的信息非常方便，尤其是在调试QML应用程序时。

trans-unit.source: QmlLive is a 3rd party tool that offers a QML runtime capable of rendering changes to the code in realtime. It avoids the need to rebuild the application after every code change and install it on the target device. You can also extend it to build a custom runtime that suits your needs.
trans-unit.target: QmlLive是第三方工具，提供了QML运行时，能够实时呈现对代码的更改。它避免了每次更改代码后都需要重建应用程序并将其安装在目标设备上的需要。您还可以扩展它以构建适合您需求的自定义运行时。

trans-unit.source: Geocoding is the derivation of geographical coordinates (latitude and longitude) from other geographical references to the locations. For example, this can be a street address. Reverse geocoding is also possible with a street address being used to determine a geographical coordinate. Geocoding is performed by using the GeocodeModel type.
trans-unit.target: 地理编码是从其他地理参考到位置的地理坐标（纬度和经度）的派生。例如，这可以是街道地址。通过使用街道地址来确定地理坐标，也可以进行反向地理编码。使用GeocodeModel类型执行地址解析。

trans-unit.source: NMEA is a common text-based protocol for specifying navigational data. For convenience, the nmeaSource property is provided to enable QML applications to read NMEA data from a log file or a TCP socket, the source will emit updates according to the time stamp of each NMEA sentence to produce a "replay" of the recorded data. To use a TCP socket set the "socket" uri scheme.
trans-unit.target: NMEA是用于指定导航数据的基于文本的通用协议。为了方便起见，提供了nmeaSource属性，以使QML应用程序能够从日志文件或TCP套接字读取NMEA数据，该源将根据每个NMEA语句的时间戳发出更新，以生成记录数据的“重播”。要使用TCP套接字，请设置“套接字” uri方案。

trans-unit.source: NMEA is a common text-based protocol for specifying navigational data. For convenience, the QNmeaPositionInfoSource is provided to enable client applications to read and distribute NMEA data in either real-time mode (for example, when streaming from a GPS device) or simulation mode (for example, when reading from a NMEA log file). In simulation mode, the source will emit updates according to the time stamp of each NMEA sentence to produce a "replay" of the recorded data.
trans-unit.target: NMEA是用于指定导航数据的基于文本的通用协议。为方便起见，提供了QNmeaPositionInfoSource以使客户端应用程序可以实时模式（例如，从GPS设备进行流式传输）或模拟模式（例如，从NMEA日志文件中读取）时读取和分发NMEA数据。在模拟模式下，源将根据每个NMEA语句的时间戳发出更新，以产生记录数据的“重放”。

libinput is a library to handle input devices. It offers an alternative to the Qt's own evdev input support. To enable using libinput, make sure the development files for libudev and libinput are available when configuring and building Qt. xkbcommon is also necessary if keyboard support is desired. With eglfs and linuxfb no further actions are necessary as these plugins use libinput by default. If libinput support is not available or the environment variable QT_QPA_EGLFS_NO_LIBINPUT is set, Qt's own evdev handlers come in to play.
trans-unit.target: libinput是一个用于处理输入设备的库。它提供了Qt自己的 evdev 输入支持的替代方法。要启用使用 libinput ，请确保在配置和构建Qt时 libudev 和 libinput 的开发文件可用。如果需要键盘支持，则也必须使用 xkbcommon 。使用 eglfs 和 linuxfb 时,无需采取进一步的操作，因为这些插件默认情况下使用 libinput 。如果没有 libinput 支持或设置了环境变量 QT_QPA_EGLFS_NO_LIBINPUT ，则将使用Qt自己的evdev处理程序。

RFC 2822, RFC 850 and RFC 1036 format: either [ddd,] dd MMM yyyy [HH:mm[:ss]][ ±tzoff] or ddd MMM dd[ HH:mm:ss] yyyy[ ±tzoff] are recognized for combined dates and times, where tzoff is a timezone offset in HHmm format. For dates and times separately, the same formats are matched and the unwanted parts are ignored. In particular, note that a time is not recognized without an accompanying date. When converting dates to string form, format dd MMM yyyy is used, for times the format is HH:mm:ss. For combined date and time, these are combined as dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss ±tzoff (omitting the optional leading day of the week from the first format recognized).
RFC 2822, RFC 850 and RFC 1036 format: either [ddd,] dd MMM yyyy hh:mm[:ss] +/-TZ or ddd MMM dd yyyy hh:mm[:ss] +/-TZ for combined dates and times.

trans-unit.source: QtMultimedia.LinearVolumeScale - Linear scale. 0.0 (0%) is silence and 1.0 (100%) is full volume. All Qt Multimedia types that have an audio volume use a linear scale.
trans-unit.target: QtMultimedia .LinearVolumeScale-线性比例。 0.0 （0％）是静音，而 1.0 （100％）是全音量。所有具有音频音量的Qt Multimedia类型都使用线性刻度。

trans-unit.source: QtMultimedia.LogarithmicVolumeScale - Logarithmic scale. 0.0 (0%) is silence and 1.0 (100%) is full volume. UI volume controls should usually use a logarithmic scale.

trans-unit.source: StackView can be used with a set of inter-linked information pages. For example, an email application with separate views to list the latest emails, view a specific email, and list/view the attachments. The email list view is pushed onto the stack as users open an email, and popped out as they choose to go back.
trans-unit.target: StackView可以与一组相互链接的信息页面一起使用。例如，具有单独视图的电子邮件应用程序可以列出最新的电子邮件，查看特定的电子邮件以及列出/查看附件。当用户打开电子邮件时，电子邮件列表视图被推入堆栈，并在他们选择返回时弹出。

trans-unit.source: StackView can have a visual background item, and it allows customizing the transitions that are used for push, pop, and replace operations.
trans-unit.target: StackView可以具有可视的背景项，并且可以自定义用于推送，弹出和替换操作的过渡。

trans-unit.source: StackView creates an instance automatically if the pushed item is a Component, or a url, and the instance will be destroyed when it is popped off the stack. See Item Ownership for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果推送的项目是Component或url，StackView会自动创建一个实例，并且当实例从堆栈中弹出时，实例将被销毁。有关更多信息，请参见项目所有权。

trans-unit.source: StackView creates an instance automatically if the replacing item is a Component, or a url. The optional
trans-unit.target: 如果替换项是Component或url，StackView会自动创建一个实例。可选的

trans-unit.source: StackView does not inherit an implicit size from items that are pushed onto it. This means that using it as the contentItem of a Dialog, for example, will not work as expected:
trans-unit.target: StackView不会从推送到其上的项目继承隐式大小。这意味着使用它作为contentItem一个的对话框，例如，将不会按预期方式工作：

trans-unit.source: StackView only takes ownership of items that it creates itself. This means that any item pushed onto a StackView will never be destroyed by the StackView; only items that StackView creates from Components or URLs are destroyed by the StackView. To illustrate this, the messages in the example below will only be printed when the StackView is destroyed, not when the items are popped off the stack:
trans-unit.target: StackView仅对其创建的项目拥有所有权。这意味着推送到StackView上的任何项目都不会被StackView破坏; 唯一的项目，StackView从创建组件或网址被破坏StackView。为了说明这一点，下面示例中的消息仅在销毁StackView时才打印，而不是从堆栈弹出项目时才打印：

trans-unit.source: StackView organizes content pages into a stack using a last-in-first-out principle: the last item to be "pushed" onto the stack is the first one to be removed, and the top-most item is always the one that is visible.
trans-unit.target: StackView使用后进先出的原则将内容页面组织到堆栈中：要“压入”堆栈中的最后一个项目是要删除的第一个项目，最上面的项目始终是可见的项目。

trans-unit.source: StackView provides a stack-based navigation model which can be used with a set of interlinked pages. StackView works according to a last-in first-out principle: the page pushed last on the stack is the one visible. Popping a page removes the last page and makes the previous one visible.
trans-unit.target: StackView提供了基于堆栈的导航模型，该模型可与一组相互链接的页面一起使用。StackView按照后进先出的原理工作：最后被推入堆栈的页面是可见的页面。弹出页面会删除最后一页，并使上一页可见。

trans-unit.source: StackView supports three primary navigation operations: push(), pop(), and replace(). These correspond to classic stack operations where "push" adds an item to the top of a stack, "pop" removes the top item from the stack, and "replace" is like a pop followed by a push, which replaces the topmost item with the new item. The topmost item in the stack corresponds to the one that is currently visible on screen. Logically, "push" navigates forward or deeper into the application UI, "pop" navigates backward, and "replace" replaces the currentItem.
trans-unit.target: StackView支持三种主要的导航操作：push（），pop（）和replace（）。这些对应于经典的堆栈操作，其中“推”将一个项目添加到堆栈的顶部，“弹出”从堆栈中删除该顶部的项目，“替换”就像一个弹出然后跟着推的操作，用推子替换最上面的项目新项目。堆栈中最顶层的项目对应于当前在屏幕上可见的项目。从逻辑上讲，“ push”向前或更深地导航到应用程序UI，“ pop”向后导航，“ replace”替换currentItem。

trans-unit.source: QtSensors supports a rich API for controlling and providing information about sensors. Naturally, not all of this functionality can be supported by all of the backends.
trans-unit.target: QtSensors支持丰富的API，用于控制和提供有关传感器的信息。自然，并非所有后端都支持所有这些功能。

trans-unit.source: QtSensors.shake gesture is available with the Qt Sensors API, but the QtSensors.SecondCounter sensor gesture is provided as example code for the Qt Sensors - SensorGesture QML Type example
trans-unit.target: Qt Sensors API提供了QtSensors .shake手势，但提供了QtSensors .SecondCounter传感器手势作为Qt传感器的示例代码-SensorGesture QML类型示例

trans-unit.source: SQLite comes with a REGEXP operation. However the needed implementation must be provided by the user. For convenience a default implementation can be enabled by setting the connect optionQSQLITE_ENABLE_REGEXP before the database connection is opened. Then a SQL statement like "column REGEXP 'pattern'" basically expands to the Qt code
trans-unit.target: SQLite带有REGEXP操作。但是，所需的实现必须由用户提供。为了方便起见，可以通过在打开数据库连接之前设置连接选项 QSQLITE_ENABLE_REGEXP 来启用默认实现。然后，像“ column REGEXP'pattern'”这样的SQL语句基本上扩展为Qt代码

trans-unit.source: SQLite has some restrictions regarding multiple users and multiple transactions. If you try to read/write on a resource from different transactions, your application might freeze until one transaction commits or rolls back. The Qt SQLite driver will retry to write to a locked resource until it runs into a timeout (see QSQLITE_BUSY_TIMEOUT at QSqlDatabase::setConnectOptions()).
trans-unit.target: SQLite对于多个用户和多个事务有一些限制。如果尝试从不同事务中读取/写入资源，则应用程序可能会冻结，直到一个事务提交或回滚为止。Qt的SQLite的，直到它运行到超时司机将重新尝试写入锁定的资源（见 QSQLITE_BUSY_TIMEOUT 在QSqlDatabase :: setConnectOptions（））。

trans-unit.source: SQLite is the in-process database system with the best test coverage and support on all platforms. Oracle via OCI, PostgreSQL, and MySQL through either ODBC or a native driver are well-tested on Windows and Linux. The completeness of the support for other systems depends on the availability and quality of client libraries.
trans-unit.target: SQLite是一种进程内数据库系统，在所有平台上都具有最佳的测试覆盖率和支持。通过OCI，PostgreSQL和MySQL（通过ODBC或本机驱动程序）的Oracle在Windows和Linux上都经过了良好的测试。对其他系统的支持的完整性取决于客户端库的可用性和质量。

trans-unit.source: SQLite minor releases sometimes break file format forward compatibility. For example, SQLite 3.3 can read database files created with SQLite 3.2, but databases created with SQLite 3.3 cannot be read by SQLite 3.2. Please refer to the SQLite documentation and change logs for information about file format compatibility between versions.
trans-unit.target: SQLite次要版本有时会破坏文件格式的前向兼容性。例如，SQLite 3.3可以读取用SQLite 3.2 创建的数据库文件，但是用SQLite 3.3 创建的数据库不能被SQLite 3.2 读取。请参考SQLite文档并更改日志，以获取有关版本之间文件格式兼容性的信息。

trans-unit.source: SQLite version 2 is "typeless". This means that you can store any kind of data you want in any column of any table, regardless of the declared data type of that column. We recommend that you map the data to QString.
trans-unit.target: SQLite版本2是“无类型的”。这意味着您可以在任何表的任何列中存储所需的任何类型的数据，而不管该列的声明数据类型如何。我们建议您将数据映射到QString。

trans-unit.source: SQLite version 3 is included as a third-party library within Qt. It can be built by passing the -qt-sqlite parameter to the configure script.
trans-unit.target: SQLite版本3作为Qt中的第三方库提供。可以通过将 -qt-sqlite 参数传递给configure脚本来构建。

Wayland is a display server protocol that helps you to create multi-process systems. Multiple client applications ("clients") can render their own content to off-screen buffers. These buffers are then passed to a display server, often called a compositor, using the Wayland protocol. Finally, the compositor composites and positions the content on a physical display.
trans-unit.target: Wayland是一种显示服务器协议，可以帮助您创建多进程系统。多个客户端应用程序（“客户端”）可以将其自己的内容呈现到屏幕外缓冲区。然后，使用Wayland协议将这些缓冲区传递到通常称为合成器的显示服务器。最后，合成器将内容合成并放置在物理显示器上。

trans-unit.source: libinput is a library to handle input devices that offers an alternative to the Qt's own evdev input support. To enable using libinput, when you configure and build Qt, make sure that the development files for libudev and libinput are available. If you require keyboard support, then xkbcommon is also necessary. With eglfs and linuxfb, no further actions are necessary as these plugins use libinput by default. If libinput support is not available or the QT_QPA_EGLFS_NO_LIBINPUT environment variable is set, then Qt's own evdev handlers are used instead.

Vulkan is a cross-platform, explicit graphics and compute API. This class provides support for loading a Vulkan library and creating an instance in a cross-platform manner. For an introduction on Vulkan instances, refer to section 3.2 of the specification.
trans-unit.target: Vulkan是跨平台的显式图形和计算API。此类提供了对加载Vulkan库和以跨平台方式创建 instance 支持。有关Vulkan实例的介绍，请参阅规范的3.2节。

trans-unit.source: Access token provided by Mapbox. The token can also be specified using the environment variable MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN, but if also set using a plugin parameter, then this last one will have the precedence over the environment variable. When not set, a development token will be used by default. The development token is subject to the Mapbox Terms of Services and must not be used in production. This property has no effect on styles hosted outside the Mapbox servers.
trans-unit.target: Mapbox提供的访问令牌。也可以使用环境变量 MAPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN 来指定令牌，但是如果还使用插件参数进行设置，则最后一个优先于环境变量。如果未设置，默认情况下将使用开发令牌。开发令牌受Mapbox 服务条款的约束，不得在生产中使用。该属性对Mapbox服务器外部托管的样式没有影响。

trans-unit.source: ID of the Mapbox map to show. An example ID is "examples.map-zr0njcqy". If this parameter is present, the specified map type will be used by default, unless another is selected. If not present, the default Mapbox map ID is "mapbox.streets". Note: neither in this parameter nor in mapbox.mapping.additional_map_ids it is allowed to use repeated map_ids. This includes the map_ids bundled in the plugin by default (documented here under Mapbox classic map IDs). Failing to do so will cause tile cache corruption.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的Mapbox地图的ID。示例ID为“ examples.map-zr0njcqy”。如果存在此参数，则默认情况下将使用指定的地图类型，除非选择了其他类型。如果不存在，则默认的Mapbox地图ID为“ mapbox.streets”。注意：在此参数和mapbox.mapping.additional_map_ids中都不允许使用重复的map_id。这包括默认情况下捆绑在插件中的map_id（在Mapbox经典地图ID下记录在此处）。否则，将导致切片缓存损坏。

Implicit sharing has another consequence on STL-style iterators: you should avoid copying a container while iterators are active on that container. The iterators point to an internal structure, and if you copy a container you should be very careful with your iterators. E.g:
Implicit sharing is used by many Qt classes to combine the speed and memory efficiency of pointers with the ease of use of classes. See the Shared Classes page for more information.

Implicit sharing has another consequence on STL-style iterators: you should avoid copying a container while iterators are active on that container. The iterators point to an internal structure, and if you copy a container you should be very careful with your iterators. E.g:
trans-unit.target: 隐式共享在STL样式的迭代器上还有另一个后果：当迭代器在该容器上处于活动状态时，应避免复制该容器。迭代器指向内部结构，并且如果您复制容器，则应非常小心使用迭代器。例如：

trans-unit.source: Implicit sharing is used by many Qt classes to combine the speed and memory efficiency of pointers with the ease of use of classes. See the Shared Classes page for more information.
trans-unit.target: 许多Qt类使用隐式共享将指针的速度和内存效率与类的易用性相结合。有关更多信息，请参见共享类页面。

trans-unit.source: Internationalization support, embedded toolchains, Build with CMake, and more.

trans-unit.target: 国际化支持，嵌入式工具链等。

trans-unit.source: macOS - Supported although there may be some retina scaling issues
trans-unit.target: macOS-受支持，尽管可能存在一些视网膜缩放问题

trans-unit.source: macOS supports a separate find buffer that holds the current search string in Find operations. This find clipboard can be accessed by specifying the FindBuffer mode.
trans-unit.target: macOS支持一个单独的查找缓冲区，该缓冲区在查找操作中保存当前的搜索字符串。可以通过指定FindBuffer模式来访问此查找剪贴板。

trans-unit.source: macOS: Two-finger douple tap (trackpad) / One-finger douple tap (magic mouse).
trans-unit.target: macOS：两指轻拍（触控板）/一指轻拍（魔术鼠标）。

trans-unit.source: Layouts are an elegant and flexible way to automatically arrange child widgets within their container. Each widget reports its size requirements to the layout through the sizeHint and sizePolicy properties, and the layout distributes the available space accordingly.

Layouts are an elegant and flexible way to automatically arrange child widgets within their container. Each widget reports its size requirements to the layout through the sizeHint and sizePolicy properties, and the layout distributes the available space accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 布局是一种优雅而灵活的方式，可以在其容器中自动排列子窗口小部件。每个小部件都通过sizeHint和sizePolicy属性向布局报告其大小要求，并且布局会相应地分配可用空间。

trans-unit.source: Q3DBars supports more than one series visible at the same time. It is not necessary for all series to have the same amount of rows and columns. Row and column labels are taken from the first added series, unless explicitly defined to row and column axes.
trans-unit.target: Q3DBars支持同时显示多个序列。并非所有系列都具有相同数量的行和列。行和列标签取自第一个添加的系列，除非明确定义为行和列轴。

trans-unit.source: Q3DCamera represents a basic orbit around centerpoint 3D camera that is used when rendering the data visualization. The class offers simple methods for rotating the camera around the origin and setting zoom level.
trans-unit.target: Q3DCamera代表围绕中心点3D相机的基本轨道，在渲染数据可视化时使用。该类提供了一些简单的方法来围绕原点旋转相机并设置缩放级别。

trans-unit.source: Q3DInputHandler is the basic input handler for wheel mouse type of input devices.
trans-unit.target: Q3DInputHandler是用于滚轮鼠标类型的输入设备的基本输入处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Q3DLight class (and Light3D QML item) are currently not usable for anything.
trans-unit.target: Q3DLight类（和Light3D QML项目）当前不适用于任何东西。

trans-unit.source: Q3DLight represents a monochrome light source in 3D space.
trans-unit.target: Q3DLight表示3D空间中的单色光源。

trans-unit.source: Q3DScatter supports more than one series visible at the same time.
Q3DScene class provides description of the 3D scene being visualized. More...
trans-unit.target: Q3DScene类提供对正在可视化的3D场景的描述。更多...

trans-unit.source: Q3DTheme class provides a visual style for graphs. More...
trans-unit.target: Q3DTheme类为图形提供视觉样式。更多...

trans-unit.source: QAbstract3DInputHandler is the base class that is subclassed by different input handling implementations that take input events and translate those to camera and light movements. Input handlers also translate raw input events to slicing and selection events in the scene.
trans-unit.target: QAbstract3DInputHandler是由不同的输入处理实现子类化的，这些输入输入实现将输入事件转换为相机和灯光运动。输入处理程序还将原始输入事件转换为场景中的切片和选择事件。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAnimation emits this signal after the animation has stopped and has reached the end.
trans-unit.target: 动画停止并到达结尾后，QAbstractAnimation会发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAnimation emits this signal whenever the current loop changes.
trans-unit.target: 只要当前循环发生变化，QAbstractAnimation就会发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAnimation emits this signal whenever the direction has been changed.
trans-unit.target: 只要方向改变，QAbstractAnimation就会发出该信号。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAnimation emits this signal whenever the state of the animation has changed from
trans-unit.target: 每当动画的状态从更改时，QAbstractAnimation都会发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAnimation provides pure virtual functions used by subclasses to track the progress of the animation: duration() and updateCurrentTime(). The duration() function lets you report a duration for the animation (as discussed above). The animation framework calls updateCurrentTime() when current time has changed. By reimplementing this function, you can track the animation progress. Note that neither the interval between calls nor the number of calls to this function are defined; though, it will normally be 60 updates per second.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractAnimation提供了纯虚拟函数，子类用于跟踪动画的进度：duration（）和updateCurrentTime（）。在持续时间（）函数可以报告持续时间的动画（如上面所讨论）。当前时间更改后，动画框架将调用updateCurrentTime（）。通过重新实现此功能，您可以跟踪动画进度。注意，该函数的调用间隔和调用次数均未定义。不过，通常每秒更新60次。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractAudioOutput implements audio functionality for QAudioOutput, i.e., QAudioOutput routes function calls to QAbstractAudioOutput. For a description of the functionality that is implemented, see the QAudioOutput class and function descriptions.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractAudioOutput实现QAudioOutput的音频功能，即QAudioOutput将函数调用路由到QAbstractAudioOutput。有关实现的功能的说明，请参见QAudioOutput类和功能说明。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractButton provides most of the states used for buttons:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractButton提供了用于按钮的大多数状态：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractButton provides support for both push buttons and checkable (toggle) buttons. Checkable buttons are implemented in the QRadioButton and QCheckBox classes. Push buttons are implemented in the QPushButton and QToolButton classes; these also provide toggle behavior if required.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractButton同时支持按钮和可检查（切换）按钮。可检查按钮在QRadioButton和QCheckBox类中实现。按钮在QPushButton和QToolButton类中实现。如果需要，它们还提供切换行为。

trans-unit.source: setAutoRepeat() sets whether the button will auto-repeat if the user holds it down. autoRepeatDelay and autoRepeatInterval define how auto-repetition is done.
trans-unit.target: setAutoRepeat（）设置如果用户按下按钮，按钮是否将自动重复。autoRepeatDelay和autoRepeatInterval定义如何进行自动重复。

trans-unit.source: setCheckable() sets whether the button is a toggle button or not.
clicked() is emitted when the button is first pressed and then released, when the shortcut key is typed, or when click() or animateClick() is called.
trans-unit.target: 点击（）当第一次按下该按钮被发射，然后被释放，当快捷键被输入，或当点击（）或animateClick（）被调用。

trans-unit.source: pressed() is emitted when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse cursor is inside the button.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标光标在按钮内时，如果按下鼠标左键，将发出按下（）。

trans-unit.source: released() is emitted when the left mouse button is released.
toggled() is emitted when the state of a toggle button changes.
trans-unit.target: 当切换按钮的状态更改时，将触发toggled（）。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractEventDispatcher also allows the integration of an external event loop with the Qt event loop.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractEventDispatcher还允许将外部事件循环与Qt事件循环集成。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractExtensionFactory is not intended to be instantiated directly; use the QExtensionFactory instead.
QAbstractExtensionManager is not intended to be instantiated directly; use the QExtensionManager instead.

QAbstractFormBuilder provides a standard interface and a default implementation for constructing forms from user interface files. It is not intended to be instantiated directly. Use the QFormBuilder class to create user interfaces from UI files at run-time. For example:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractFormBuilder提供了一个标准接口和一个默认实现，用于从用户界面文件构造表单。它不打算直接实例化。使用QFormBuilder类在运行时从UI文件创建用户界面。例如：

trans-unit.source: load() handles reading of UI format files from arbitrary QIODevices, and construction of widgets from the XML data that they contain.
trans-unit.target: load（）处理从任意QIODevices读取UI格式文件，并从它们包含的XML数据构造窗口小部件。

trans-unit.source: save() handles saving of widget details in UI format to arbitrary QIODevices.
trans-unit.target: save（）处理将UI格式的小部件详细信息保存到任意QIODevices。

trans-unit.source: workingDirectory() and setWorkingDirectory() control the directory in which forms are held. The form builder looks for other resources on paths relative to this directory.
trans-unit.target: workingDirectory（）和setWorkingDirectory（）控制保存表单的目录。表单构建器在相对于此目录的路径上查找其他资源。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemDelegate is the abstract base class for delegates in the model/view framework. The default delegate implementation is provided by QStyledItemDelegate, and this is used as the default delegate by Qt's standard views. However, QStyledItemDelegate and QItemDelegate are independent alternatives to painting and providing editors for items in views. The difference between them is that QStyledItemDelegate uses the current style to paint its items. We therefore recommend using QStyledItemDelegate as the base class when implementing custom delegates or when working with Qt style sheets.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemDelegate是模型/视图框架中委托的抽象基类。默认委托实现由QStyledItemDelegate提供，并且由Qt的标准视图用作默认委托。但是，QStyledItemDelegate和QItemDelegate是绘画和为视图中的项目提供编辑器的独立替代方法。它们之间的区别在于QStyledItemDelegate使用当前样式来绘制其项目。因此，在实现自定义委托或使用Qt样式表时，建议将QStyledItemDelegate用作基类。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModel presents a hierarchy of tables, but the views currently provided by QML can only display list data. In order to display the child lists of a hierarchical model, use the DelegateModel QML type, which provides the following properties and functions to be used with list models of QAbstractItemModel type:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModel提供了表的层次结构，但是QML当前提供的视图只能显示列表数据。为了显示层次模型的子列表，请使用DelegateModel QML类型，该类型提供以下属性和函数，可与QAbstractItemModel类型的列表模型一起使用：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModel provides a hierarchical tree of data, whereas QML only operates on list data. rootIndex allows the children of any node in a QAbstractItemModel to be provided by this model.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModel提供数据的分层树，而QML仅对列表数据进行操作。 rootIndex 允许此模型提供QAbstractItemModel中任何节点的子级。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModel provides a hierarchical tree of data, whereas QML only operates on list data. This function assists in using tree models in QML.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModel提供数据的分层树，而QML仅对列表数据进行操作。此功能有助于在QML中使用树模型。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModel provides an interface to data that is flexible enough to handle views that represent data in the form of tables, lists, and trees. However, when implementing new models for list and table-like data structures, the QAbstractListModel and QAbstractTableModel classes are better starting points because they provide appropriate default implementations of common functions. Each of these classes can be subclassed to provide models that support specialized kinds of lists and tables.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModel提供了一个数据接口，该接口足够灵活，可以处理以表，列表和树的形式表示数据的视图。但是，当为列表和类似表的数据结构实现新模型时，QAbstractListModel和QAbstractTableModel类是更好的起点，因为它们提供了常用功能的适当默认实现。这些类中的每一个都可以被子类化以提供支持特殊类型的列表和表的模型。

trans-unit.source: roleNames() to expose the role names to the QML frontend. For example, the following version returns the selected table's field names as role names:
trans-unit.target: roleNames（）将角色名称公开给QML前端。例如，以下版本返回所选表的字段名称作为角色名称：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModelTester employs non-destructive tests, which typically consist in reading data and metadata out of a given item model. QAbstractItemModelTester will also attempt illegal modifications of the model. In models which are properly implemented, such attempts should be rejected, and no data should be changed as a consequence.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModelTester使用非破坏性测试，通常包括从给定项目模型中读取数据和元数据。QAbstractItemModelTester还将尝试对模型进行非法修改。在正确实施的模型中，此类尝试应被拒绝，并且因此不得更改任何数据。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModelTester helps catching the most common errors in custom item model classes. By performing a series of tests, it will try to check that the model status is consistent at all times. The tests will be repeated automatically every time the model is modified.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModelTester帮助捕获自定义项目模型类中最常见的错误。通过执行一系列测试，它将尝试始终检查模型状态是否一致。每次修改模型时，测试将自动重复。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModelTester may also report additional debugging information as logging messages under the qt.modeltest logging category. Such debug logging is disabled by default; refer to the QLoggingCategory documentation to learn how to enable it.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModelTester还可以在 qt.modeltest 日志记录类别下以日志记录消息形式报告其他调试信息。默认情况下，这种调试日志记录是禁用的；请参阅QLoggingCategory文档以了解如何启用它。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemModelTester will report testing failures through the Qt Test logging mechanisms.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemModelTester将通过Qt Test日志记录机制报告测试失败。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemView class is the base class for every standard view that uses a QAbstractItemModel. QAbstractItemView is an abstract class and cannot itself be instantiated. It provides a standard interface for interoperating with models through the signals and slots mechanism, enabling subclasses to be kept up-to-date with changes to their models. This class provides standard support for keyboard and mouse navigation, viewport scrolling, item editing, and selections. The keyboard navigation implements this functionality:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemView类是使用QAbstractItemModel的每个标准视图的基类。QAbstractItemView是一个抽象类，本身无法实例化。它提供了一个标准接口，可通过信号和插槽机制与模型进行互操作，从而使子类能够随着模型的更改而保持最新。此类为键盘和鼠标导航，视口滚动，项目编辑和选择提供标准支持。键盘导航实现了此功能：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemView provides a lot of protected functions. Some are concerned with editing, for example, edit(), and commitData(), whilst others are keyboard and mouse event handlers.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemView提供了很多受保护的功能。有些涉及编辑，例如edit（）和commitData（），而另一些涉及键盘和鼠标事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemView provides common slots such as edit() and setCurrentIndex(). Many protected slots are also provided, including dataChanged(), rowsInserted(), rowsAboutToBeRemoved(), selectionChanged(), and currentChanged().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractItemView提供了常见的插槽，例如edit（）和setCurrentIndex（）。还提供了许多受保护的插槽，包括dataChanged（），rowsInserted（），rowsAboutToBeRemoved（），selectionChanged（）和currentChanged（）。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractItemView, QGraphicsView, QMdiArea, QPlainTextEdit, QScrollArea, and QTextEdit
QAbstractListModel provides a standard interface for models that represent their data as a simple non-hierarchical sequence of items. It is not used directly, but must be subclassed.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractListModel为模型提供了标准接口，这些模型将其数据表示为简单的非分层项目序列。它不能直接使用，但必须被子类化。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractMessageHandler is an abstract base class that provides a callback interface for handling messages. For example, class QXmlQuery parses and runs an XQuery. When it detects a compile or runtime error, it generates an appropriate error message, but rather than output the message itself, it passes the message to the message() function of its QAbstractMessageHandler. See QXmlQuery::setMessageHandler().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractMessageHandler是一个抽象基类，它提供用于处理消息的回调接口。例如，类QXmlQuery解析并运行XQuery。当它检测到编译错误或运行时错误时，它会生成适当的错误消息，而不是输出消息本身，而是将消息传递给其QAbstractMessageHandler的message（）函数。参见QXmlQuery :: setMessageHandler（）。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractNetworkCache is the base class for every standard cache that is used by QNetworkAccessManager. QAbstractNetworkCache is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractNetworkCache是QNetworkAccessManager使用的每个标准缓存的基类。QAbstractNetworkCache是一个抽象类，不能实例化。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractPlanarVideoBuffer extends QAbstractVideoBuffer to support mapping non-continuous planar video data. Implement this instead of QAbstractVideoBuffer when the abstracted video data stores planes in separate buffers or includes padding between planes which would interfere with calculating offsets from the bytes per line and frame height.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractPlanarVideoBuffer扩展了QAbstractVideoBuffer以支持映射非连续平面视频数据。当抽象的视频数据将平面存储在单独的缓冲区中或在平面之间包含填充时，请实施此方法，而不是QAbstractVideoBuffer，这会干扰计算每行字节和帧高度的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea already provides horizontal and vertical scroll bars by default. You can call this function to replace the default horizontal scroll bar with your own custom scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractScrollArea默认已经提供了水平和垂直滚动条。您可以调用此函数，用您自己的自定义滚动条替换默认的水平滚动条。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea already provides vertical and horizontal scroll bars by default. You can call this function to replace the default vertical scroll bar with your own custom scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，QAbstractScrollArea已提供垂直和水平滚动条。您可以调用此函数，用您自己的自定义滚动条替换默认的垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea always shows a scroll bar. This property is ignored on systems with transient scroll bars (e.g., on Mac from version 10.7).
trans-unit.target: QAbstractScrollArea始终显示滚动条。在具有临时滚动条的系统上（例如，在Mac版本10.7中），将忽略此属性。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea is a low-level abstraction of a scrolling area. The area provides a central widget called the viewport, in which the contents of the area is to be scrolled (i.e, the visible parts of the contents are rendered in the viewport).
trans-unit.target: QAbstractScrollArea是滚动区域的低层抽象。该区域提供了一个称为视口的中央窗口小部件，该区域的内容将在其中滚动（即，内容的可见部分将在视口中呈现）。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea shows a scroll bar when the content is too large to fit and not otherwise. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: 当内容太大而无法容纳时，QAbstractScrollArea将显示滚动条。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractScrollArea, QLabel, QLCDNumber, QSplitter, QStackedWidget, and QToolBox
QAbstractSlider emits a comprehensive set of signals:

QAbstractSlider provides a virtual sliderChange() function that is well suited for updating the on-screen representation of sliders. By calling triggerAction(), subclasses trigger slider actions. Two helper functions QStyle::sliderPositionFromValue() and QStyle::sliderValueFromPosition() help subclasses and styles to map screen coordinates to logical range values.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSlider提供了一个虚拟的slideChange（）函数，非常适合更新滑块的屏幕显示。通过调用triggerAction（），子类可以触发滑块动作。两个帮助函数QStyle :: sliderPositionFromValue（）和QStyle :: sliderValueFromPosition（）帮助子类和样式将屏幕坐标映射到逻辑范围值。

trans-unit.source: actionTriggered() is emitted when the scroll bar is changed by user interaction or via the triggerAction() function.
trans-unit.target: actionTriggered（）当滚动条被用户交互或经由改变被发射triggerAction（）函数。

trans-unit.source: pageStep: The larger of two natural steps that an abstract slider provides and typically corresponds to the user pressing PageUp or PageDown.
trans-unit.target: pageStep：抽象滑块提供的两个自然步骤中的较大者，通常对应于用户按下PageUp或PageDown的步骤。

trans-unit.source: rangeChanged() is emitted when the scroll bar's range of values has changed.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的值范围已更改时，会发出rangeChanged（）。

trans-unit.source: singleStep: The smaller of two natural steps that an abstract sliders provides and typically corresponds to the user pressing an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: singleStep：抽象滑块提供的两个自然步骤中的较小者，通常对应于用户按下箭头键。

trans-unit.source: sliderMoved() is emitted when the user drags the slider.
sliderPosition: The current position of the slider. If tracking is enabled (the default), this is identical to value.
trans-unit.target: slidePosition：滑块的当前位置。如果启用了跟踪（默认设置），则与value相同。

trans-unit.source: sliderPressed() is emitted when the user starts to drag the slider.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动滑块时，将发出liderPressed（）。

trans-unit.source: sliderReleased() is emitted when the user releases the slider.
value: The bounded integer that QAbstractSlider maintains.
valueChanged() is emitted when the scroll bar's value has changed. The tracking() determines whether this signal is emitted during user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 滚动条的值更改时将发出valueChanged（）。tracking（）确定在用户交互过程中是否发出此信号。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket can be used with QTextStream and QDataStream's stream operators (operator<<() and operator>>()). There is one issue to be aware of, though: You must make sure that enough data is available before attempting to read it using operator>>().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket可以与QTextStream和QDataStream的流运算符（operator <<（）和operator >>（））一起使用。但是，有一个问题需要注意：在尝试使用operator >>（）读取数据之前，必须确保有足够的数据可用。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket is the base class for QTcpSocket and QUdpSocket and contains all common functionality of these two classes. If you need a socket, you have two options:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket是QTcpSocket和QUdpSocket的基类，并且包含这两个类的所有常用功能。如果需要套接字，则有两个选择：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket provides a set of functions that suspend the calling thread until certain signals are emitted. These functions can be used to implement blocking sockets:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket提供了一组函数，这些函数可以挂起调用线程，直到发出某些信号为止。这些函数可用于实现阻塞套接字：

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket's API unifies most of the differences between the two protocols. For example, although UDP is connectionless, connectToHost() establishes a virtual connection for UDP sockets, enabling you to use QAbstractSocket in more or less the same way regardless of the underlying protocol. Internally, QAbstractSocket remembers the address and port passed to connectToHost(), and functions like read() and write() use these values.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket的API统一了这两种协议之间的大部分差异。例如，尽管UDP是无连接的，但connectToHost（）为UDP套接字建立虚拟连接，使您可以以几乎相同的方式使用QAbstractSocket，而与基础协议无关。在内部，QAbstractSocket会记住传递给connectToHost（）的地址和端口，并且read（）和write（）之类的函数会使用这些值。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket, QBuffer, QFileDevice, QLocalSocket, QNetworkReply, and QProcess
QAbstractSocket::SocketError is not a registered metatype, so for queued connections, you will have to register it with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() and qRegisterMetaType().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket :: SocketError不是注册的元类型，因此对于排队连接，您必须使用Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）和qRegisterMetaType（）注册它。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket::SocketState is not a registered metatype, so for queued connections, you will have to register it with Q_DECLARE_METATYPE() and qRegisterMetaType().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket :: SocketState不是注册的元类型，因此对于排队连接，您将必须使用Q_DECLARE_METATYPE（）和qRegisterMetaType（）注册它。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSocket::SocketState is not a registered metatype, so for queued connections, you will have to register it with Q_REGISTER_METATYPE() and qRegisterMetaType().
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSocket :: SocketState不是注册的元类型，因此对于排队连接，您必须使用Q_REGISTER_METATYPE（）和qRegisterMetaType（）注册它。

trans-unit.source: QUdpSocket::bind() prepares the socket for accepting incoming datagrams, much like QTcpServer::listen() for TCP servers. Whenever one or more datagrams arrive, QUdpSocket emits the readyRead() signal. Call QUdpSocket::readDatagram() to read the datagram.
trans-unit.target: QUdpSocket :: bind（）准备用于接受传入数据报的套接字，就像TCP服务器的QTcpServer :: listen（）一样。每当一个或多个数据报到达时，QUdpSocket就会发出readyRead（）信号。调用QUdpSocket :: readDatagram（）读取数据报。

trans-unit.source: waitForBytesWritten() blocks until one payload of data has been written to the socket.
trans-unit.target: waitForBytesWritten（）阻塞，直到将一个有效载荷数据写入套接字为止。

trans-unit.source: waitForConnected() blocks until a connection has been established.
waitForDisconnected() blocks until the connection has closed.
waitForReadyRead() blocks until new data is available for reading.
trans-unit.target: waitForReadyRead（）会阻塞，直到可以读取新数据为止。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSpinBox also provide a virtual function stepEnabled() to determine whether stepping up/down is allowed at any point. This function returns a bitset of StepEnabled.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSpinBox还提供了虚函数stepEnabled（）来确定是否在任何时候都允许步进。此函数返回StepEnabled的位集。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractSpinBox provides a virtual stepBy() function that is called whenever the user triggers a step. This function takes an integer value to signify how many steps were taken. E.g. Pressing Qt::Key_Down will trigger a call to stepBy(-1).
trans-unit.target: QAbstractSpinBox提供了一个虚拟的stepBy（）函数，只要用户触发一个步骤，就会调用该函数。此函数采用整数值表示已执行了多少步骤。例如，按Qt :: Key_Down将触发对stepBy（-1）的调用。

trans-unit.source: text: The text that is displayed in the QAbstractSpinBox.
text: The text that is displayed in the QAbstractSpinBox.
wrapping: Whether the QAbstractSpinBox wraps from the minimum value to the maximum value and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 包装：QAbstractSpinBox是否从最小值包装到最大值，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: wrapping: Whether the QAbstractSpinBox wraps from the minimum value to the maximum value and vice versa.
QAbstractTableModel provides a standard interface for models that represent their data as a two-dimensional array of items. It is not used directly, but must be subclassed.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractTableModel为模型提供标准接口，这些模型将其数据表示为二维项目数组。它不能直接使用，但必须被子类化。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractVideoFilter is meant to be subclassed. The subclasses are then registered to the QML engine, so they can be used as a QML type. The list of filters are assigned to a VideoOutput type via its filters property.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractVideoFilter打算被子类化。然后将这些子类注册到QML引擎，因此可以将它们用作QML类型。过滤器列表通过其filter属性分配给VideoOutput类型。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractVideoFilter provides a convenient way for applications to run image processing, computer vision algorithms or any generic transformation or calculation on the output of a VideoOutput type, regardless of the source (video or camera). By providing a simple interface it allows applications and third parties to easily develop QML types that provide image processing algorithms using popular frameworks like OpenCV. Due to the close integration with the final stages of the Qt Multimedia video pipeline, accelerated and possibly zero-copy solutions are feasible too: for instance, a plugin providing OpenCL-based algorithms can use OpenCL's OpenGL interop to use the OpenGL textures created by a hardware accelerated video decoder, without additional readbacks and copies.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractVideoFilter用于在输出的应用程序运行的图像处理，计算机视觉算法或任何通用变换或计算提供了一种方便的方式VideoOutput类型，而不管源（视频或照相机）。通过提供一个简单的界面，它允许应用程序和第三方轻松开发QML类型，从而使用诸如OpenCV之类的流行框架提供图像处理算法。由于与Qt多媒体视频流水线的最终阶段紧密集成，因此加速和可能为零拷贝的解决方案也是可行的：例如，提供基于OpenCL的算法的插件可以使用OpenCL的OpenGL互操作来使用由Qt多媒体创建的OpenGL纹理。硬件加速的视频解码器，无需其他回读和复制。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractXmlNodeModel bridges the gap between the arbitrary structure of the non-XML data to be queried and the well-defined structure of XML data understood by QXmlQuery.
trans-unit.target: QAbstractXmlNodeModel弥合了要查询的非XML数据的任意结构与QXmlQuery可以理解的XML数据的定义良好的结构之间的鸿沟。

trans-unit.source: QAbstractXmlReceiver is an abstract base class that provides a callback interface for receiving an XQuery sequence, usually the output of an QXmlQuery, and transforming that sequence into a structure of your choosing, usually XML. Consider the example:
trans-unit.target: QAbstractXmlReceiver是一个抽象基类，它提供一个回调接口来接收XQuery序列（通常是QXmlQuery的输出），并将该序列转换为您选择的结构（通常是XML）。考虑示例：

trans-unit.source: QAccelerometer, QAltimeter, QAmbientLightSensor, QAmbientTemperatureSensor, QCompass, QDistanceSensor, QGyroscope, QHolsterSensor, QHumiditySensor, QIRProximitySensor, QLidSensor, QLightSensor, QMagnetometer, QOrientationSensor, QPressureSensor, QProximitySensor, QRotationSensor, QTapSensor, and QTiltSensor
trans-unit.target: QAccelerometer，QAltimeter，QAmbientLightSensor，QAmbientTemperatureSensor，QCompass，QDistanceSensor，QGyroscope，QHolsterSensor，QHumiditySensor，QIRProximitySensor，QLidSensor，QLightSensor，QMagnetometer，QOrientationSensor，QPressureSensor，QProximitySensor，QRotationSensor，QTapSensor和QTiltSensor

trans-unit.source: QAccelerometerFilter, QAltimeterFilter, QAmbientLightFilter, QAmbientTemperatureFilter, QCompassFilter, QDistanceFilter, QGyroscopeFilter, QHolsterFilter, QHumidityFilter, QIRProximityFilter, QLidFilter, QLightFilter, QMagnetometerFilter, QOrientationFilter, QPressureFilter, QProximityFilter, QRotationFilter, QTapFilter, and QTiltFilter
Relation: Describes the relationship between objects in the object hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 关系：描述对象层次结构中对象之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: Role: Describes the role the object fills in the user interface, e.g., if it is a window, a text edit, or a cell in a table.
trans-unit.target: 角色：描述对象在用户界面中所扮演的角色，例如，是窗口，文本编辑还是表格中的单元格。

trans-unit.source: queryAccessibleInterface() returns accessible interfaces for QObjects. All widgets in Qt provide interfaces; if you need interfaces to control the behavior of other QObject subclasses, you must implement the interfaces yourself, although the QAccessibleObject convenience class implements parts of the functionality for you.
trans-unit.target: queryAccessibleInterface（）返回QObject的可访问接口。Qt中的所有小部件都提供接口；如果您需要接口来控制其他QObject子类的行为，则必须自己实现接口，尽管QAccessibleObject便利类为您实现了部分功能。

trans-unit.source: State: The objects can be in a number of different states. Examples of states are whether the object is disabled, if it has focus, or if it provides a pop-up menu.
trans-unit.target: 状态：对象可以处于许多不同的状态。状态示例包括对象是否被禁用，是否具有焦点或是否提供了弹出菜单。

trans-unit.source: QAccessibleInterface supports several sub interfaces. In order to provide more information about some objects, their accessible representation should implement one or more of these interfaces.
trans-unit.target: QAccessibleInterface支持多个子接口。为了提供有关某些对象的更多信息，它们的可访问表示应实现这些接口中的一个或多个。

trans-unit.source: QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent signals a change in the text selection of an object. More...
trans-unit.target: QAccessibleTextSelectionEvent发出对象文本选择更改的信号。更多...

trans-unit.source: QActionEvent, QChildEvent, QCloseEvent, QDragLeaveEvent, QDropEvent, QDynamicPropertyChangeEvent, QEnterEvent, QExposeEvent, QFileOpenEvent, QFocusEvent, QGestureEvent, QGraphicsSceneEvent, QHelpEvent, QHideEvent, QIconDragEvent, QInputEvent, QInputMethodEvent, QInputMethodQueryEvent, QMoveEvent, QPaintEvent, QPlatformSurfaceEvent, QResizeEvent, QScrollEvent, QScrollPrepareEvent, QShortcutEvent, QShowEvent, QStateMachine::SignalEvent, QStateMachine::WrappedEvent, QStatusTipEvent, QTimerEvent, QWhatsThisClickedEvent, and QWindowStateChangeEvent

QAnimationGroup provides methods for adding and retrieving animations. Besides that, you can remove animations by calling removeAnimation(), and clear the animation group by calling clear(). You may keep track of changes in the group's animations by listening to QEvent::ChildAdded and QEvent::ChildRemoved events.
trans-unit.target: QAnimationGroup提供添加和检索动画的方法。除此之外，您可以通过调用removeAnimation（）删除动画，并通过调用clear（）清除动画组。您可以通过侦听QEvent :: ChildAdded和QEvent :: ChildRemoved事件来跟踪组动画的变化。

trans-unit.source: QAnimationGroup takes ownership of the animations it manages, and ensures that they are deleted when the animation group is deleted.
trans-unit.target: QAnimationGroup拥有其管理的动画的所有权，并确保在删除动画组时将其删除。

trans-unit.source: QApplication provides this functionality as a slot.
QApplication specializes QGuiApplication with some functionality needed for QWidget-based applications. It handles widget specific initialization, finalization.
trans-unit.target: QApplication专为QGuiApplication专门提供一些基于QWidget的应用程序所需的功能。它处理小部件特定的初始化，完成。

trans-unit.source: QApplication's main areas of responsibility are:
QAreaSeries supports the following format tags:

QAtomicInteger provides several implementations of the atomic test-and-set, fetch-and-store, and fetch-and-add functions. Each implementation defines a memory ordering semantic that describes how memory accesses surrounding the atomic instruction are executed by the processor. Since many modern architectures allow out-of-order execution and memory ordering, using the correct semantic is necessary to ensure that your application functions properly on all processors.
trans-unit.target: QAtomicInteger提供了原子测试和设置，获取和存储以及获取和添加功能的几种实现。每个实现都定义了一种内存排序语义，该语义描述了处理器如何执行原子指令周围的内存访问。由于许多现代体系结构允许乱序执行和内存排序，因此必须使用正确的语义来确保您的应用程序在所有处理器上都能正常运行。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, leaving the compiler and processor to freely reorder memory accesses.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，使编译器和处理器可以自由地对内存访问进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access before and after the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，可确保原子操作之前和之后的内存访问（按程序顺序）不会被重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access before the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered after the atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，确保原子操作之前（按程序顺序）的内存访问不会在原子操作之后重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access following the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered before the atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，可确保原子操作之后（按程序顺序）的内存访问不会在原子操作之前重新排序。

trans-unit.source: QAtomicPointer provides several implementations of the atomic test-and-set, fetch-and-store, and fetch-and-add functions. Each implementation defines a memory ordering semantic that describes how memory accesses surrounding the atomic instruction are executed by the processor. Since many modern architectures allow out-of-order execution and memory ordering, using the correct semantic is necessary to ensure that your application functions properly on all processors.
trans-unit.target: QAtomicPointer提供了原子测试和设置，获取和存储以及获取和添加功能的几种实现。每个实现都定义了一种内存排序语义，该语义描述了处理器如何执行原子指令周围的内存访问。由于许多现代体系结构允许乱序执行和内存排序，因此必须使用正确的语义来确保您的应用程序在所有处理器上都能正常运行。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, leaving the compiler and processor to freely reorder memory accesses.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，使编译器和处理器可以自由地对内存访问进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access before and after the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，可确保原子操作之前和之后的内存访问（按程序顺序）不会被重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access before the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered after the atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，确保原子操作之前（按程序顺序）的内存访问不会在原子操作之后重新排序。

trans-unit.source: memory ordering semantics, which ensures that memory access following the atomic operation (in program order) may not be re-ordered before the atomic operation.
trans-unit.target: 内存排序语义，可确保原子操作之后（按程序顺序）的内存访问不会在原子操作之前重新排序。

trans-unit.source: QAudioDeviceInfo lets you query for audio devices--such as sound cards and USB headsets--that are currently available on the system. The audio devices available are dependent on the platform or audio plugins installed.
trans-unit.target: QAudioDeviceInfo使您可以查询系统上当前可用的音频设备，例如声卡和USB耳机。可用的音频设备取决于所安装的平台或音频插件。

trans-unit.source: QAudioInput lets you record audio with an audio input device. The default constructor of this class will use the systems default audio device, but you can also specify a QAudioDeviceInfo for a specific device. You also need to pass in the QAudioFormat in which you wish to record.
trans-unit.target: QAudioInput使您可以使用音频输入设备录制音频。此类的默认构造函数将使用系统的默认音频设备，但您也可以为特定设备指定QAudioDeviceInfo。您还需要传递要在其中录制的QAudioFormat。

trans-unit.source: QAudioInput provides several ways of measuring the time that has passed since the start() of the recording. The processedUSecs() function returns the length of the stream in microseconds written, i.e., it leaves out the times the audio input was suspended or idle. The elapsedUSecs() function returns the time elapsed since start() was called regardless of which states the QAudioInput has been in.
trans-unit.target: QAudioInput提供了多种方法来测量自录制开始（）以来经过的时间。已 processedUSecs() 函数返回以毫秒为单位写入的流的长度，即，它省去了音频输入被挂起或空闲的时间。该elapsedUSecs（）函数返回，因为时间流逝开始（）被调用，无论哪些国家的QAudioInput一直英寸

trans-unit.source: QAudioProbe is the client facing class for probing audio - this class is implemented by media backends to provide this functionality.
trans-unit.target: QAudioProbe是用于探测音频的面向客户端的类-此类由媒体后端实现以提供此功能。

trans-unit.source: QAuthenticator supports the following authentication methods:
QAxAggregated can be subclassed to implement additional COM interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 可以将QAxAggregated子类化以实现其他COM接口。

trans-unit.source: QAxBase is an abstract class that cannot be used directly, and is instantiated through the subclasses QAxObject and QAxWidget. This class provides the API to access the COM object directly through its IUnknown implementation. If the COM object implements the IDispatch interface, the properties and methods of that object become available as Qt properties and slots.
trans-unit.target: QAxBase是不能直接使用的抽象类，并且通过子类QAxObject和QAxWidget实例化。此类提供了API，以通过其IUnknown实现直接访问COM对象。如果COM对象实现IDispatch接口，则该对象的属性和方法可用作Qt属性和插槽。

trans-unit.source: QAxBase is an abstract class that provides an API to initialize and access a COM object or ActiveX control.
trans-unit.target: QAxBase是一个抽象类，它提供一个API来初始化和访问COM对象或ActiveX控件。

trans-unit.source: QAxBase transparently converts between COM data types and the equivalent Qt data types. Some COM types have no equivalent Qt data structure.
trans-unit.target: QAxBase透明地在COM数据类型和等效的Qt数据类型之间转换。某些COM类型没有等效的Qt数据结构。

trans-unit.source: QAxBindable provides an interface between the Qt widget and the COM object.
trans-unit.target: QAxBindable提供了Qt小部件和COM对象之间的接口。

trans-unit.source: QAxFactory defines a factory for the creation of COM objects.
trans-unit.target: QAxFactory定义了一个用于创建COM对象的工厂。

trans-unit.source: QAxObject also inherits most of its ActiveX-related functionality from QAxBase, notably dynamicCall() and querySubObject().
trans-unit.target: QAxObject还从QAxBase继承了大多数与ActiveX相关的功能，尤其是dynamicCall（）和querySubObject（）。

trans-unit.source: QAxObject is a QObject and can be used as such, e.g. it can be organized in an object hierarchy, receive events and connect to signals and slots.
trans-unit.target: QAxObject是一个QObject，可以这样使用，例如，它可以按对象层次结构进行组织，接收事件并连接到信号和插槽。

trans-unit.source: QAxObject provides a QObject that wraps a COM object.
trans-unit.target: QAxObject提供了一个包装COM对象的QObject。

trans-unit.source: QAxScriptManager, QAxScript and QAxScriptEngine provide an interface to the Windows Script Host.
trans-unit.target: QAxScriptManager，QAxScript和QAxScriptEngine提供了Windows脚本宿主的接口。

trans-unit.source: QAxSelect dialog can be used to provide users with a way to browse the registered COM components of the system and select one. It also provides a combo box for selecting desired sandboxing level. The CLSID of the selected component can then be used in the application to e.g. initialize a QAxWidget:
trans-unit.target: QAxSelect对话框可用于为用户提供一种浏览系统中已注册的COM组件并选择一个组件的方式。它还提供了用于选择所需沙箱级别的组合框。然后，可以在应用程序中使用所选组件的CLSID来初始化QAxWidget：

trans-unit.source: QAxWidget also inherits most of its ActiveX-related functionality from QAxBase, notably dynamicCall() and querySubObject().
trans-unit.target: QAxWidget也继承了大部分从它的ActiveX相关的功能QAxBase，特别是dynamicCall（）和querySubObject（）。

trans-unit.source: QAxWidget is a QWidget and can mostly be used as such, e.g. it can be organized in a widget hierarchy and layouts or act as an event filter. Standard widget properties, e.g. enabled are supported, but it depends on the ActiveX control to implement support for ambient properties like e.g. palette or font. QAxWidget tries to provide the necessary hints.
trans-unit.target: QAxWidget是一个QWidget，可以按原样使用，例如，可以按小部件层次结构和布局进行组织或充当事件过滤器。支持标准的窗口小部件属性（例如启用），但是它依赖ActiveX控件来实现对环境属性（例如调色板或字体）的支持。QAxWidget尝试提供必要的提示。

trans-unit.source: QAxWidget is a QWidget that wraps an ActiveX control.
QBackingStore enables the use of QPainter to paint on a QWindow with type RasterSurface. The other way of rendering to a QWindow is through the use of OpenGL with QOpenGLContext.
trans-unit.target: QBackingStore支持使用QPainter在类型为RasterSurface 的QWindow上绘画。渲染到QWindow的另一种方法是将OpenGL与QOpenGLContext一起使用。

trans-unit.source: QBackingStore might be used by an application that wants to use QPainter without OpenGL acceleration and without the extra overhead of using the QWidget or QGraphicsView UI stacks. For an example of how to use QBackingStore see the Raster Window Example.
trans-unit.target: 想要使用QPainter而不使用OpenGL加速并且没有使用QWidget或QGraphicsView UI堆栈的额外开销的应用程序可能会使用QBackingStore。有关如何使用QBackingStore的示例，请参见“ 栅格窗口示例”。

trans-unit.source: QBar3DSeries supports the following format tags for QAbstract3DSeries::setItemLabelFormat():

QBarCategoryAxis can be set up to show an axis line with tick marks, grid lines, and shades. Categories are drawn between the ticks. It can be used also with a line series, as demonstrated by the Line and BarChart Example.
trans-unit.target: 可以将QBarCategoryAxis设置为显示带有刻度线，网格线和阴影的轴线。在刻度之间绘制类别。如Line和BarChart Example所示，它也可以与线系列一起使用。

trans-unit.source: QBarDataProxy optionally keeps track of row and column labels, which QCategory3DAxis can utilize to show axis labels. The row and column labels are stored in a separate array from the data and row manipulation methods provide alternate versions that do not affect the row labels. This enables the option of having row labels that relate to the position of the data in the array rather than the data itself.
trans-unit.target: QBarDataProxy可以选择跟踪行和列标签，QCategory3DAxis可以利用它们来显示轴标签。行和列标签与数据存储在单独的数组中，并且行操作方法提供了不影响行标签的备用版本。这样就可以选择具有与数组中的数据位置相关的行标签，而不是与数据本身相关的行标签。

trans-unit.source: QBarDataProxy takes ownership of all QtDataVisualization::QBarDataRow objects passed to it, whether directly or in a QtDataVisualization::QBarDataArray container. If bar data row pointers are used to directly modify data after adding the array to the proxy, the appropriate signal must be emitted to update the graph.
trans-unit.target: QBarDataProxy拥有直接传递给QtDataVisualization :: QBarDataRow或位于QtDataVisualization :: QBarDataArray容器中的所有QtDataVisualization :: QBarDataRow对象的所有权。如果在将数组添加到代理后使用条形数据行指针直接修改数据，则必须发出适当的信号以更新图形。

trans-unit.source: QBitArray supports & (AND), | (OR), ^ (XOR), ~ (NOT), as well as &=, |=, and ^=. These operators work in the same way as the built-in C++ bitwise operators of the same name. For example:
trans-unit.target: QBitArray支持 & （AND）， | （OR）， ^ （XOR）， ~ （NOT）以及 &= ， |= 和 ^= 。这些运算符的工作方式与内置的同名C ++按位运算符相同。例如：

trans-unit.source: QBitArray uses 0-based indexes, just like C++ arrays. To access the bit at a particular index position, you can use operator[](). On non-const bit arrays, operator[]() returns a reference to a bit that can be used on the left side of an assignment. For example:
trans-unit.target: QBitArray使用基于0的索引，就像C ++数组一样。要访问特定索引位置的位，可以使用operator []（）。在非常量位数组上，operator []（）返回对可在赋值左侧使用的位的引用。例如：

trans-unit.source: QBitmap is a QPixmap subclass ensuring a depth of 1, except for null objects which have a depth of 0. If a pixmap with a depth greater than 1 is assigned to a bitmap, the bitmap will be dithered automatically.
trans-unit.target: QBitmap是确保深度为1 的QPixmap子类，深度为0的空对象除外。如果将深度大于1的像素图分配给位图，则位图将自动抖动。

trans-unit.source: QBluetoothDeviceInfo provides information about a Bluetooth device's name, address and class of device.
trans-unit.target: QBluetoothDeviceInfo提供有关蓝牙设备的名称，地址和设备类别的信息。

trans-unit.source: QBluetoothLocalDevice provides functions for getting and setting the state of local Bluetooth devices.
trans-unit.target: QBluetoothLocalDevice提供用于获取和设置本地蓝牙设备状态的功能。

trans-unit.source: QBluetoothServer is used to implement Bluetooth services over RFCOMM or L2cap.

QBluetoothServiceInfo is not a value type in the traditional sense. All copies of the same service info object share the same data as they do not detach upon changing them. This ensures that two copies can (de)register the same Bluetooth service.
trans-unit.target: QBluetoothServiceInfo不是传统意义上的值类型。相同服务信息对象的所有副本共享相同的数据，因为它们在更改时不会分离。这样可以确保两个副本可以（注销）同一蓝牙服务。

trans-unit.source: QBluetoothServiceInfo provides information about a service offered by a Bluetooth device. In addition it can be used to register new services on the local device. Note that such a registration only affects the Bluetooth SDP entries. Any server listening for incoming connections (e.g an RFCOMM server) must be started before registerService() is called. Deregistration must happen in the reverse order.
trans-unit.target: QBluetoothServiceInfo提供有关蓝牙设备提供的服务的信息。另外，它可用于在本地设备上注册新服务。请注意，此类注册仅影响蓝牙SDP条目。在调用registerService（）之前，必须启动任何侦听传入连接的服务器（例如RFCOMM服务器）。注销必须以相反的顺序进行。

trans-unit.source: L2CAP is a low level datagram-oriented Bluetooth socket. Android does not support L2CAP for socket connections.
trans-unit.target: L2CAP是面向底层数据报的蓝牙套接字。Android不支持L2CAP进行套接字连接。

trans-unit.source: RFCOMM is a reliable, stream-oriented socket. RFCOMM sockets emulate an RS-232 serial port.
trans-unit.target: RFCOMM是一个可靠的，面向流的套接字。RFCOMM套接字模拟RS-232串行端口。

trans-unit.target: QBluetoothTransferManager使用OBEX将放置命令发送到远程设备。典型的OBEX传输初始化如下：
